Description.Text: Stop at Hatton Court Hotel to discover the wonders of Gloucester. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour room service, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, meeting facilities. Internet access â€“ wireless (complimentary), whirlpool bathtub, non smoking rooms, heating, wake-up service can be found in selected guestrooms. Access to the hotel's garden will further enhance your satisfying stay. Convenience and comfort makes Hatton Court Hotel the perfect choice for your stay in Gloucester.
